scenes.text: Because Cortés figured out something about the human brain that psychologists wouldn't discover for another 500 years.
scenes.prompt: Split scene. Left side: Hernán Cortés wearing a morion helmet with red plume, full beard, metal armor with shoulder plates and arm guards, with a knowing smile pointing to his head. Right side: a modern scientist in white lab coat looking at brain scans with surprise. A timeline arrow connects them showing 500 years. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: And it's the same reason you can scroll TikTok for three hours but can't study for thirty minutes.
scenes.prompt: Split scene. Left side: standing cartoon person happily scrolling phone with a clock showing 3 hours passed, content expression. Right side: same standing cartoon person slumped over a book with a clock showing only 30 minutes, exhausted defeated expression. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: The same reason you set goals in January and forget them by February.
scenes.prompt: Split scene. Left side: standing cartoon person writing excitedly on a notepad labeled 'GOALS', calendar showing January. Right side: same notepad crumpled on the floor, standing cartoon person with blank confused expression, calendar showing February. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: The same reason you know exactly what you need to do but still don't do it.
scenes.prompt: Standing cartoon person with a clear checklist floating in front of them showing specific tasks. Their arms are crossed, feet planted, refusing to move toward the list. A thought bubble shows them fully understanding the tasks. Their body language shows stubborn inaction. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A sleeping figure on a couch inside a prohibition circle with a diagonal line through it. The laziness explanation is ruled out. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A flexing arm inside a prohibition circle with a diagonal line through it. The weakness explanation is ruled out. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

A cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, sneaking around with a mischievous grin. The brain holds a wrench and is loosening bolts on a machine labeled 'YOUR PLANS'. The brain looks guilty but intentional. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

Close-up of a cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, with narrowed scheming eyes and a deliberate smirk. The brain rubs its small hands together deviously. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: It has been your whole life.
scenes.prompt: A timeline showing ages from baby to adult, with a cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe, appearing at every stage, always with the same mischievous expression. The sabotage has been constant. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: But once you understand how, you can use that same biology against itself.
scenes.prompt: Standing cartoon person with a clever expression, holding puppet strings attached to a cartoon brain with small arms and legs, expressive face on the frontal lobe. The brain looks confused as it is being controlled. The person has turned the tables. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: I'm going to show you five stupidly simple systems that scientists, athletes, and monks figured out.
scenes.prompt: Three figures standing in a row: a scientist in white lab coat with safety goggles on forehead, an athlete in athletic wear with muscular build, and a monk in simple robes with shaved head and peaceful expression. Each holds up a glowing orb. The number '5' floats above them. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Systems so simple they seem like cheating.
scenes.prompt: A glowing playbook or manual labeled 'SYSTEMS' with a suspicious eye peeking at it. The simplicity is emphasized by the thin, small size of the book. A thought bubble shows 'Too easy?' Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Large bold text showing 'NOT CHEATING' with a checkmark. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: They're just what schools never bothered to teach you.
scenes.prompt: A school building with a teacher at a chalkboard. The chalkboard shows basic subjects but has a blank space where these systems should be. An arrow points to the blank space with a question mark. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
An arrow curving backward toward a simple map showing Mexico. Motion lines suggest traveling back in time and place. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
